name: PEG Growth Investing
description: Advanced growth strategy using PEG ratio (PE/Growth) - find growth stocks at reasonable prices
goal: Identify growth stocks with favorable PEG ratios, indicating good value relative to growth rate

conditions.formula_description: PEG Ratio < 1 indicates undervalued growth stock

rules.description: Buy growth stocks with PEG < 1 and strong revenue growth

conditions.formula_description: PEG Ratio > 2 indicates overvalued growth stock

rules.description: Sell overvalued growth stocks with high PEG
